question.title: I have a "cannot resolve symbol" "button" how do I fix my code? I want this button to say clicked me after clicking
question.body:
Currently this is the code I have and I am unsure how to fix it: Also the id for the button is btnClickMe

//Find the button
    Button btn = findViewById(R.Button.btnClickMe);
    //Set button usability
    btn.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() {
        @Override
        public void onClick(View v) {
        Log.i("MyFirstApp", "Button Clicked!");
            Toast.makeText(MainActivity.this, "Button Clicked!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT)
            .show();
        }
    });

answers.body:
As far I know, in Android, R.Button does not exist. All view IDs are inside R.id.
So change you code as below ->

Button btn = findViewById(R.id.btnClickMe);

Import the proper R file like

import package_name.R

question_comments.body: maybe helpful or related Cannot resolve symbol 'button' -Android Studio [closed
